comments.body: Before we used to check that kNoError was equal to fErrorType when only one of fDataErrorLow and fDataErrorHigh was empty. Isn't this necessary anymore?

When fErrorType == kNoError o both fDataErrorHigh and fDataErrorLow should be empty. 
Actually they should not be empty only when fErrorType=kAsymError. I think now is correct and clearer, while before I am not sure.  With a wrong copy ctor the assert at line 296 was failing
